DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate long term safety effectiveness Endurant Stent Graft System endovascular treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm post-approval environment , endpoint establish protocol . The clinical objective study evaluate long term safety effectiveness Endurant Stent Graft System assess 5 year freedom Aneurysm-Related Mortality ( ARM ) .
